pr_title: [FLINK-16364] [table] Deprecate the methods in TableEnvironment proposed by FLIP-84

timeline.message: [FLINK-16364] [table] use TableEnvironment#executeSql and StatementSet instead of deprecated TableEnvironment#sqlUpdate and TableEnvironment#insertInto
[FLINK-16364] [table] use TableEnvironment#executeSql and StatementSet instead of deprecated TableEnvironment#sqlUpdate and TableEnvironment#insertInto
[FLINK-16364] [table] use TableEnvironment#executeSql and StatementSet instead of deprecated methods: TableEnvironment#sqlUpdate and TableEnvironment#insertInto
[FLINK-16364] [table] use TableEnvironment#executeSql and StatementSet instead of deprecated methods: TableEnvironment#sqlUpdate and TableEnvironment#insertInto

timeline.bodyText: We should also deprecate Line#830 and Line#840?
timeline.author: KurtYoung
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -839,7 +845,9 @@ default Table fromValues(DataType rowType, Object... values) {
 	 *
 	 * @param extended if the plan should contain additional properties,
 	 * e.g. estimated cost, traits
+	 * @deprecated use {@link StatementSet#explain(ExplainDetail...)}.
 	 */
+	@Deprecated

timeline.message:
[FLINK-16364] [table] Deprecate the methods proposed by FLIP-84,

including:
TableEnvironment.sqlUpdate(String)
TableEnvironment.insertInto(String, Table)
TableEnvironment.execute(String)
TableEnvironment.explain(boolean)
TableEnvironment.fromTableSource(TableSource<?>)
Table.insertInto(String)

please use TableEnvironment#executeSql for single statement,
use Table#executeInsert for single sink,
use TableEnvironment#createStatementSet for multiple sinks.
[FLINK-16364] [table] use TableEnvironment#from instead of deprecated method: TableEnvironment#scan
[FLINK-16364] [table] refactor plan verify tool based on StatementSet
[FLINK-16364] [table] use TableEnvironment#executeSql and StatementSet instead of deprecated methods: TableEnvironment#sqlUpdate and TableEnvironment#insertInto
address kurt's comment: deprecate TableEnvironment#explain(Table) (fix [FLINK-16364] [table] Deprecate the methods proposed by FLIP-84)
fix [FLINK-16364] [table] refactor plan verify tool based on StatementSet
[FLINK-16364] [table] use Table#explain instead of deprecated method: TableEnvironment#explain(Table) or TableEnvironment#explain(Table, Boolean)

address kurt's comments: rename syncExecuteInsert to execInsertXXAndWaitResult  (fix [FLINK-16364] [table] use TableEnvironment#executeSql and StatementSet instead of deprecated methods: TableEnvironment#sqlUpdate and TableEnvironment#insertInto)
fix failed test  (fix [FLINK-16364] [table] use TableEnvironment#executeSql and StatementSet instead of deprecated methods: TableEnvironment#sqlUpdate and TableEnvironment#insertInto)
fix failed test (fix [FLINK-16364] [table] use TableEnvironment#executeSql and StatementSet instead of deprecated methods: TableEnvironment#sqlUpdate and TableEnvironment#insertInto)
